html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03592023-04-21LAB, ISC, NRCAN, TC
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code (Menstrual Products)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE (MENSTRUAL PRODUCTS) in order to (1) require federally regulated employers to provide menstrual products in each toilet room regardless of their marked gender, or in another location that is accessible by employees at all times and offers a reasonable amount of privacy; (2) ensure that a covered container for the disposal of menstrual products are provided in each toilet compartment; and (3) make consequential amendments to the Administrative Monetary Regulations (Canada Labour Code) Regulations to ensure these requirements are enforceable through administrative monetary penalties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0078 Publication Date: 2023-05-10
AttachmentsAttachment
